name: Roy Tang
text: I actually didn't remember if BB8 was an astromech, but yeah sure. The list isn't exhaustive. It does make you wonder, why do X-Wings need a droid to do their jump calculations? TIE fighters don't, the Falcon didn't. Star Destroyers aren't shown to need droids for calculations.    Another thing: if they already have the AI communications technology, why are ships like X-Wings and the Falcon and TIE fighters and Star Destroyers piloted manually? Why not by voice command, with feedback in tones and beeps? Or if piloting is too complicated for a computer, why not at least have some simpler functionality like comms handled by droid-like AIs? (Similar to Star Trek)
